import Back from "../assets/runway.jpg" import { useState } from "react"; // import "../assets/styles/login.css" const Login = ({onAdd}) => { var sectionStyle = { backgroundImage: `url(${Back})`, backgroundRepeat: "no-repeat", backgroundSize: "cover", Width: "100%", backgroundPosition: "center", opacity: 1, padding: 0, margin: 0 }; const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() onAdd({email, password}) setEmail('') setPassword('') } return(

Login

setEmail(e.target.value)}>
setPassword(e.target.value)}>
Forgot password?
) } export default Login
